flawed_nl_solution:
She has 120 minutes to practice because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=120>>120
She has already spent 98 minutes on her work because 30 + 25 + 38 = <<30+25+38=98>>98
She has 22 minutes to use on finger exercise because 120-98 = <<120-98=22>>22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 93, not 98. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
